data.name: The Heiress of Sorcery - Artbook
data.detailed_description:
This DLC contains artbook for the game.

After downloading, the artbook will be in the game folder:
Context menu "Properties" → Local Files → Browse → PDF file
data.about_the_game:
This DLC contains artbook for the game.

After downloading, the artbook will be in the game folder:
Context menu "Properties" → Local Files → Browse → PDF file

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: XP
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: PDF
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: PDF
